title: Unveiling antioxidant capacity of standardized chitosan-tripolyphosphate microcapsules containing polyphenol-rich extract of Portulaca oleraceae
content:
Publication date: 30 April 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 8

Author(s): Lokot Donna Lubis, Arya Tjipta Prananda, Nur Aira Juwita, Muhammad Amin Nasution, Rony Abdi Syahputra, Sumaiyah Sumaiyah, Rodiah Rahmawaty Lubis, Muhammad Fauzan Lubis, Ririn Astyka, Jihan Firyal Atiqah
